model_comment: This is the model that will appear on the page
default_material_comment: This is the model's starting material, its usualy a cube with a material, can leave empty if the model already has a applied material
id_comment: This is the woocomerce product id associated with the 3d viewer's data
thumbnail_index_comment: This is the thumbnail's index associated with the 3d viewer, if 1, the viewer will appear when the second thumbnail is clicked
